name: BinSync
description: Adds support for cross-decompiler collab in the BinSync supported decompilers.
longdescription: Adds support for cross-decompiler collab in the BinSync supported decompilers.

installinstructions.Darwin: Install through the Binja Plugin Manager. To update do `pip install -U binsync`
installinstructions.Linux: Install through the Binja Plugin Manager. To update do `pip install -U binsync`
installinstructions.Windows: Install through the Binja Plugin Manager. To update do `pip install -U binsync`

author: BinSync Team
